Corrugator Efficiency and Process Control Solutions

Escada Corrugator control systems offer flexible and modular tools that run your corrugator at the fastest speeds possible, while increasing quality which enables customers to:

  • Sell more output by leveraging innovative technology like Intelligent speed control
  • Reduce product returns and process waste through intelligent closed loop warp-control systems.
  • Improved production consistency and repeatability by leveraging powerful BI tools and recipe management.
  • Full suite of integrated roll stock, line-up and trimming software

Empower. Evolve. Excite.

Contact Us
Existing Customers
Since the upgrade of our EFI Escada solution, restart waste, warp , delamination and speed changes have all improved.

Shane Hooper, Corrugator waste controller, DS Smith

We were able to average less than 4 minutes per order for an entire year on a machine that had fast set up capabilities. That had never been done in our company and to this day still ends up being the best of all of our plants.

Escada Closed Loop Corrugator Control and trimming solutions

Industry leading solutions to improve corrugator productivity and efficiency

EFI Escada has a long-standing heritage in the Corrugated Industry for it’s innovative approach to closed loop control system design. From wet and dry end systems with integrated warp control, through to business intelligence, recipe management and ‘intelligent speed control’, our solutions have increased profit for many leading companies in the industry. From our headquarters in the UK and USA, we supply systems globally which cover the entire corrugated manufacturing process. Escadas innovative product portfolio offers plant-wide solutions, perfectly placed to maximize the potential of your operation. Our systems are designed in a modular fashion and will interface with any other machines or control systems, offering un-rivalled flexibility and adaptability to your specific circumstances. Many Escada customers have seen significant improvements in corrugator throughput, board quality and cost of manufacture with significant reductions in process waste, set up time and down time of the Corrugator.

Business Management Solutions

Manufacturing Efficiency Solutions

Manufacturing Efficiency Solutions

Paper and logistics management solutions

Syncro 7: Wet & Dry end Control systems

Syncro 7 is a single point Corrugator Control System, born through years of development in dry end and wet end control. It covers every phase of corrugator application, from the roll stands through to the take-off conveyors. Syncro 7 ensures harmonious operation through flexible interfaces to any mixture of machines, delivering maximum performance every time.

Download Brochure →

PROFILE: Warp control system

Profile is our process control system which has revolutionized corrugator performance. Profile can operate as a ‘recipe’ based system, or using our unique ‘closed loop’ option with the Escada Laser Bar. Profile offers a huge reduction in waste and energy consumption, which, combined with increased run speeds, means your productivity and profit can greatly increase.

Download Case Study →

CorrTrim: Corrugator scheduling

Our CorrTrim corrugator scheduling software allows schedulers to trim all flutes and grades in an order pool at the same time which helps reduce side trim, maximize web width and reduce un-necessary costs. CorrTrim empowers schedulers to produce more efficient and flexible schedules in much less time maintaining maximum corrugator uptime.

Download Brochure →

CorrLink: Real time production data

CorrLink uses a bidirectional communications driver to link to your corrugator, and provides real-time corrugator lineup, production, and order status information. CorrLink transmits lineup information directly to the corrugator and provides operators and production supervisors with configurable views of the corrugator lineup.

Contact Our Team →

Discover the value of being an EFI customer

Our system process audit is an additional service we offer to our customers and features a comprehensive review of machine and system settings, working practices and processes, conducted by a team of independent experts who have many years of experience in the industry working on all types of corrugated machinery. We also offer our customers free access to ongoing training and maintenance videos via our Escada ‘Knowledge Centre’ ensuring our solutions continue to provide you with optimum ROI.

Integration Options and Partners

EFI Converting efficiency solutions offer innovative ways to improve the overall productivity of our operation by seamlessly linking real time machine information to the plan scheduling solution. For a detailed list of integration options or to learn more about how EFI solutions can work for your business contact our team and schedule a free consultation.
